name: Lights O(N/UT)
description:
Lights O(N/UT)

In this game your goal is to reach the portal of each level. Use levers, switch lights, climb ladders and bypass walls to reach it. But be aware! Just because something doesn't exist in your reality doesn't mean it doesn't exist at all. But does an object exist, if nobody observe it?

____________

Controls:

Menu NavigationMovementNokia Feeling
(Numpad)Horizontal:
A / D
Vertical:
W / S
Submit:
E / SpaceHorizontal:
A / D
Action:
E / Space
Open Menu:   
EscHorizontal:
4 / 6
Vertical:
8 / 2
Submit /
Action:
5
Open Menu:
7

____________

This game is an entry for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3. The optional theme was "ON / OFF". So I tried to create a game, which has the switching of lights as main gameplay mechanic with the question in mind: "Does an object exist, if nobody observe it?"

____________

Sources: 
Sprites and sounds are created by myself (Krasno Sound Font 2 File was used for the sounds)
Fonts: Classic 3310
